metadata.synopsis: Minor dialogues before and after Aradin/ Zevlor's confrontation insider the camp.

0.speaker: Aradin
0.text: Out of my way. I'll tear the horns off that bloody coward!
0.context: NodeContext: Furious at Zevlor, who nearly locked him out of the grove.

1.speaker: Aradin
1.context: NodeContext: 'Pardon' is drected at a tiefling. Full of disdain.
